title: IAA Tonight | Ime Udoka is in Trouble, Ben Simmons Speaks AND Brett Favre's Scandal
description: Boston Celtics Head Coach Ime Udoka has been suspended for the 2022-23 season for violations of team policies. Leger Douzable and Brandon Flowers discuss what this means for the defending Eastern Conference Champions and if this ruins their chance of having a deep playoff run. Ben Simmons finally spoke about his time in Philly. Plus, former NFL quarterback Brett Favre has been mired for months in a welfare-funds controversy in his home state of Mississippi.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Brandon Flowers)
